name: Kevins In The Movies Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: Kevin Bacon's best movie may have been 'Apollo 13'. Who was the director?
questions.explanation:
Ron Howard.

	It should have won the 'Best Picture' Oscar.

questions.text: Bacon also starred in 'The River Wild'. Who was the female star?
questions.explanation:
Meryl Streep.

	Good action and adventure film.

questions.text: Kevin Kline starred in 'French Kiss' with Meg Ryan. What is Ryan's fear early in the movie?
Kline also starred in 'The Big Chill'. Which of the following was NOT in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Ed Harris.

	Galloway had a small role as an 'outsider'.

questions.text: Kevin Costner starred in 'Field of Dreams'. Where was the story set?
Who played Costner's Indian friend in 'Dances With Wolves'?
Costner also starred in 'No Way Out'. Who played his romantic interest?
questions.explanation:
Sean Young.

	Fine suspense movie - even if the ending is a little strained.

questions.text: Kevin Spacey starred in 'Glengarry Glen Ross'. Which of the following was NOT also in the cast?
Spacey was also in 'Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil'. Where was that story set?
Which of the following does NOT feature one of the four Kevins?
questions.explanation:
'Racing With The Moon'.

	It's Kline ('In and Out'), Bacon ('Footloose') and Spacey ('Usual'). 'Moon' is Sean Penn.
